flashDependencies: Install dfu-util and coreutils from your distribution's repos. For example, for Ubuntu: apt-get install dfu-util coreutils
flashInstructions: Execute the following from the unzipped directory: sudo ./flashall.sh
Note: If you have trouble executing, you may need to modify the file permissions first: sudo chmod +x ./flashall.sh

flashDependencies: You need MacPorts installed on your system.
Run the following to install dfu-utils, usbutils, and coreutils: sudo port install dfu-util usbutils coreutils && sudo port activate dfu-util
flashInstructions: Execute the following from the unzipped directory: sudo ./flashall.sh
Note: If you have trouble executing, you may need to modify the file permissions first: sudo chmod +x ./flashall.sh

flashDependencies: Install Windows drives for Edison from here
flashInstructions: Open a terminal with administrative privileges and execute the following from the unzipped directory: flashall.bat
